thread.title: Top 5 nursing trends shaping health care in 2025

author: Moira K. McGhee
title: Top 5 nursing trends shaping health care in 2025
text:
[Vivian Health](https://www.vivian.com/) examines five trends that could redefine nurses' roles, enhance patient care, and alter the entire healthcare system in 2025 and beyond.
